Me and my wife went to some old cemeteries in apalachicola Fl here's some of myka's photo's from the trip to the chestnut cemetery where the deceased were from shipwrecks,yellow fever, or confederate soldiers,the other photos are us goofing off throughout the day whoooop whoooop heading home tommorrow 9 1/2 hour dr. exhausting just thinking about it

today was fun, opened nice presents, ate awesome food, metal detected on the beach, read a book,held hands with my sweetheart on the beach, built A MEGA sand castle of doom, with a 4 foot trench,went crab hunting watched Vacation, pretty good xmas if you ask me happy holidays and have a happy new year

its christmas eve me and myka spent this year with her family, we lucked out and got a beach house and we see the ocean from our front door,we drove 9 1/2 hours last night/this morning, but its worth it, it doesn't seem like christmas already .this year has flown by, very quickly,but I'm thankful, for my wonderful wife and family, lots of good things have happend this year but also with the good you have the bad,we've had our share of bad, Mike passed,I lost my job,etc.but its nice being out here, its just beautiful looking for shells, in 75 degree weather,when it should be really cold out. sorry I rambling here some photos MERRY XMAS!

sooo I finally broke down and bought a laptop and this livejournal thing says I haven't updated in 29 weeks thats a long ass time,I used to update religously, Lots of this have happend so many it would take way more than one entry to tell you about,I'm still cutting hair for a living,I do as many art shows as possible to get my name out there and make some extra cash,me and myka have been married for over a year and a half,and we have a puppy now, were leaving this tuesday to head to florida for a week, I'm super excited,I'm going to metal detect on the beach and relax with my wifey heres a photo from the show of me and my painting here' one of my wifey and friend nick

random facts Lincoln was seeing the play "Our American Cousin" when he was shot. Lincoln was the first president to have a beard while in office. Lincoln, Nebraska was named after Abraham Lincoln. Abe Lincoln's mother, Nancy Hanks Lincoln, died when the family dairy cow ate poisonous mushrooms and she drank the milk. A plot was developed to steal Lincoln's body, so a secret society to guard his tomb was formed. During the Civil War, telegraph wires were strung to follow the action on the battlefield. But there was no telegraph office in the White House, so Lincoln went across the street to the War Department to get the news. Lincoln was the tallest president. He was 6 feet and four inches tall. Lincoln once had a dream right before the fall of Richmond that he would die. He dreamt that he was in the White House, he heard crying and when he found the room it was coming from he asked who had died. The man said the President. He looked in the coffin and saw his own face. A week later Lincoln died. Lincoln was shot on Good Friday. Robert Todd Lincoln arrived too late to stop three seperate presidential assassinations.He met his father, President Abraham Lincoln, at the theatre after John Wilkes Booth had fired the shot. He went to a Washington train station to meet President Garfeild, arriving only minutes after he was shot. And, he traveled to Buffalo, New York to meet President Mckinly, but got there after the fatal shot had already been fired. Lincoln had a cat named "Bob," a turkey named "Jack," and a dog named "Jib." He was the first president to be photographed at his inauguration. John Wilkes Booth (his assassin) can be seen standing close to Lincoln in the picture. Lincoln was the only president to receive a patent, for a device for lifting boats over shoals. Lincoln's brother, half-brothers, and brothers-in-law fought in the Confederate Army. Abraham Lincoln was shot while watching a performance of Our American Cousin at Ford's Theatre in Washington, D.C. The same play was also running at the McVerick Theatre in Chicago on May 18, 1860, the day Lincoln was nominated for president in that city. Lincoln's favorite sport was wrestling. Lincoln worked as a deck hand on a Mississippi flatboat. Lincoln had a substitute fight for him during the Civil War. Not a paid substitute as some might think. When J. Summerfield Staples, the son of an army chaplain, heard that Lincoln felt that the president should be fighting in the war (but couldn't because of all his duties), Staples volunteered to fight as a substitute. Both he and his father survived through the war, and returned home to Stroudsburg, Pennsylvania. If one traveled to the cemetary there, they would find a headstone that reads: J. Summerfield Staples A private of Co. C176 Reg. P.V. Also a member of the 2, Reg. D.C. Vol. A substitute for Abraham Lincoln died Jan. 11, 1888 Aged 43 yrs,-4 mos. & 27 days Lincoln had a wart on his right cheek, a scar on his thumb from an ax accident, and a scar over his right eye from a fight with a gang of thieves. Abraham Lincoln grew his beard out of the suggestion of an 11 year old girl. John Wilkes Booth's brother once saved Abraham Lincoln's son's life. Abe Lincoln is the U.S. president most frequently portrayed in films. The contents of his pockets on the night of his assassination weren't revealed until February 12, 1976. They contained two pairs of spectacles, a chamois lens cleaner, an ivory and silver pocketknife, a large white Irish linen handkerchief, slightly used, with "A. Lincoln" embroidered in red, a gold quartz watch fob without a watch, a new silk-lined, leather wallet containing a pencil, a Confederate five-dollar bill, and news clippings of unrest in the Confederate army, emancipation in Missouri, the Union party platform of 1864, and an article on the presidency by John Bright. He was named after his grandfather. Lincoln and his wife held seances in the White House. They had great interest in psychic phenomena. Lincoln loved the works of Edgar Allan Poe. Abraham Lincoln was the first president to be born outside of the original thirteen colonies. He was born in Kentucky.

I'm a hairstylist now and take appointments at H20 hair studio In Murfreesboro
to make an appointment and for directions call 615-867-6426,I take walk-ins
I finally got married and I'm a licensed cosmetologist and I work at a super nice salon in cool springs, so thats whats new

lately I'm finishing up Cosmetology school, and working my ars off 40 hours a week and 25 at school, and still finding time to hang out with my lady and make art and do artshows, thats why you haven't heard from in a f-ing long time....I rarely have time to make post ,I usually just check my myspace,and facebook....peace bitches
I'm finally on Facebook, so add me

There is no way I could possibly catch you up with whats happened with me in the past year or so...because thats about how long it seems since I last posted,I'm still engaged,I get married June 30th of next year in GA, I'm about 1/3 of the way finished with cosmetology school,soo I'm thinking about where I would like to work,Hopefully not around Nashville,Maybe another state...depending on where myka lands a job, hopefully an artsy fartsy city-i have been doing lost of hair, and artshows...currently finishing up on a Johnny cash pencil drawing....it's pretty rad,Ive got tons of complaments on it...lots of people I knew from high school are starting to move to M'boro, by the time they all get here...I'll move away again.... and who knows maybe some will follow me...maybe not, I'm def. not a trend setter.... weve been in Hotlanta since Thursday...Myka got her wisdom teeth cut out today poor thang, I've been taking care of her changing her galls....and feeding her ,her meds.....poor girl can hardly talk......,my mom scheduled me an appointment with a dentist/oral doctor,2 weeks from this monday...I'm getting my pull out too....
but if your wondering I'm doing the hair thing now and its fun
-jeff

I neglect my LIve journal..all the time...
well to say the  least I"m extremely busy..
I've been in school for over 3 weeks now...I'm doing pretty good...for all of you that don't know...I'm in Cosmetology school..
I just recently got another art show...in NAshville...(Westend area)
I have been doing my best not to let my Father,bring me down...long story short,.I don't know if I even want him in my life anymore...because he hasn't changed...lots of things has happened...
a freaking tornado took out my old golden gallon,geez...I'm glad I don't work there anymore....I got a interveiw for Bed BAth and beyond..but turned it down...less money...and I need all the money I can get...I finished my tattoo....The MAdonna ,A salvador dali peice...I've been ok lately...just trying to stay afloat on bills etc.Jason,and mormon are talking about moving to M'boro...thats cool....it's a harder move than they think...I went to a house show..how I became the bomb......I did a hip hop event in M'boro..live hip hop artist...and I did live graffiti...and sold the peice I did.....that was cool....Myka's in Summer school......we're planning a trip to Destin.....soon..I'm excited..I want to get out of here...so bad...I just want to move away...
so thats the dirt...

So...I work a whopping 10am-7pm today, man, working on cars/trucks...isn't easy but ,it's sure easier than working in a bread factory....soo I'm trying to figure out what cosmotology school I want to go to....I'm kind of excited about that...I can't wait to go back to school...I'm getting ready to get a huge tattoo March 11th....It's Dali's Madonna....and it will be amazing....Tim's going to tattoo me...
Me and Josh are both getting work done this day Josh is getting a large sword that I designed tattoo on his back. it should be cool
I miss tattooing....damn I miss it
maybe someday I'll swing back that way...as for now I'm taking one day at a time....still creating artwork on a regualr basis, trading as much as possible, very interested in doing an art show soon if I can find a legit place....I don't want anymore work stolen...
I haven't talked to my Dad in a while wonder why>? it's kind of weird it seems like he calls when he wants....like he's too busy...
b ut thats enough babbling on
-Bert master Jeff

so I got 4 peices of art work stolen, from a show I had at Hair of the dog..(Someones Guilty)..long story,but I filed a police report....It sucks being a struggling artist....seems nothing works out,the cop told me...you should take it as a complament....I guess...a fucking sick one if you ask me

next Saturday is my last fucking day at Office depot... thank jesus hmmm...whats new....working on some art work, I did a few shirts for Jason and mormon, I'm working on a jazz painting...I saw Tim McGraw..lol I'm going to a show sunday the 29th in Gallatin

So...as of recently I picked up an internship at The Grand Palace....learning how to screen print,posters and shirts...it's cool....the smell kinda irriates me pretty bad... ...I got to help get ready for the Castanets/how I became the bomb show...I got to meet the band and hung out with Meadows and Jesse.....,I got asked by a zine in LA to release some of my work for there Zine...and I'm designing a pair of shoes for a travelling show call Sneaker pimps,http://www.sneakerpimpsusa.com/ there will be show is the States and Asia,Europe,South America...my shoes will travel all these places......I have to mail off a peice of art to HATROBOTS in Utah....and then work on a small piece to send to LA.........Kinda busy lately....still working at Crap Depot....and hating it....but it helps me make rent...I'm gonna possible go see one of Jason's first show at lucky's Sunday......so thats whats up....not alot...Been trying to spend as much time with Myka as possible....between all of this.......we're getting ready to go to her family's for X-mas.....ATL-GA......then Jan-1-8 we'll bein Tampa Bay and Orlando...going to Disney FOOLS here's a piece I did a little while ago

So the Sonic Mural is Half way finished...alot of hard work...but it's work, thats worth it, sooo the Buzzfest thing got cancelled and I got pissed because I did a poster and since they can't promise me a ticket anymore....I requested a NIN ticket and got it....Yay Me!...
P>S I didn't win that Nossi Contest but the director called me and was going on and on about how she wanted me to come to her school...that I'm sooo talented ....and how I should look into it.....blah! I'm soooo Not going to go to Nossi....I don't think it's even accredited.....anyways....if I go back it will be to finish up my associates....and or Cosmo. school.....

I'm doing a mural for sonic on Tennessee BLVD. In M'boro
it's coming along.....a hamburger and hot dog playing a trumpet and saxophone....w/ a bunny drinking a cherry limeade....soon there will be a squirel..w/ fries and maybe a turtle....it looks cool I had a lady stop by and offer me another job...and an asian girl asked me was I tagging...lol I wouldn't be that obvious,lol right now I'm in Atlanta for Labor day...then Monday afternoon I'll be back to work on it a bit more....aside from that gonna buy bikes....how cool will that be, pretty damn cool

soo...whats up with the muthfakin Rain..it's sucks majorly...it's weird cause it's kinda not rain but it's not really sprinkling....constantly,so...I worked at the depot.... of hell..today..might I add we're getting something new..if you don't do exactly what your suppose to , or say what you have to to every customer, you get a repramand...yeah and if you get 3 your fired....lol Bityches!...so Josh came over today brought Eddie Murphy stand up....along with that movie Ray...I have been watching alot of Black comedy stuff...lately and I love it..it's just funny as helll what can I say....soooo I'm suppose to talk to Mariann ,Myka's old Manager at Sonic about painting a small Mural for them....sweet, it will give me something to keep me occupied..and make a few dollars....it's on a brick wall at Sonic...so it shouldn't be soooo hard....she's going to pay for supplies.. and such...umm.....in a few days I'll hear about the Buzzfest Contest...maybe I'll win....if I do, it's free tickets and a 2 years scholarship to NOssi...maybe I'll look into it even though it is a crappy school...something might be interesting...if its free

okkkk whats New, I buzzed my hair off yup it's very short...
hmmm....I haven't been up to much kinda 2nd job hunting..I may do laundry today or something....I've been kinda sick lately, For the past couple of days I feel gross, My sides have been hurting something brutal....and I kinda just been working at the Depot of doom....no one comments, on this thing, nor calls.. me anymore , I sometimes feel like I'm dead to the outside world of Murfreesboro...or maybe it's the depot effect, shit I don't no...Josh has been hanging out with me and myka lately, thats cool....he's a cool kid...I've known him for ages....been watching the hell outta dave chappelle and sin city, I wanted to enter the Arts festival in Cenntennial.... but I'm tentless...soo thats out...maybe I'll enter the untitled fall art show.....I got to keep occupied with something artsy....I've been thinking alot about Cosmotology school....seeing that I was screw over number 2 in the tattoo business.. I'm almost thinking I'm too nice for it because I always get walked on , Maybe I'll be a hair stylist or a bartender or something shit, I no I don't want to work at office depot forever nor do I want to live in Murfreesboro for along time either....sooo lately I enter the buzzfest poster contest I find out the results at the end of the month, maybe I'll win that
that would be cool....Myka cut her hair it's real short and real cute, I love that girl the end

the buzz fest poster, is looking pretty splendid, I did the poster contest way back when they had the poster contest the first year, buzz fest 1 so long ago no one ever heard of sum 41, ofcourse I didn't win, but I have a better chance this year..I just want to win...I don't give a goat poop about the nossi scholarship, but the front row tickets would be nice....and just to add it to my portfolio
ps....work blew hard today real busy
I need to look for a part tim job like 15 or so hours...so I can start trying to save money

I've been thinking about doing the Buzzfest 6 poster contest, Not really sad about The studio, just glad I'm out of a crappy situation, Now I can get a 2nd job if I need too,or hang out if I want to... and plus the arts in Cenntennial park is coming and I'm going to enter it... and have a booth and sell some art, next monday Myka and I are going to Atl. to Get her hair cut and see her family, then maybe go to A Rome braves game....box seats.....that would be cool , never been to a baseball game.....

Hanging out with Josh in the library haven't seen him in a while

I was never really a football/sports person but I went to a football game last night with my step dad, mainly because I've never been and I wanted to see the Pretty Nashville skyline from way high up, it didn't disappoint me..... there was sooo many people like thousands of tiny fire ants...

plus I lost my cell phone, sorry Myka, I missed your calls.......love you..I miss you come back home Syracuse is way tooo far away
Sooo My mom found it today it was stuck inside the couche ..weird

I simply put in my all and he deceived me. after the confrontation, My mind was made up....and I chose the path that was less travelled, I learned how people work, and how some people suck....and how I grew from the situation, I'm still an Artist, simply put
,Bertrand
